title: Does Apple still sell AirPods 1? - Quora

response.answer_text: No they don’t unless maybe on refurbs.They sell: - AirPods 2 (still branded as AirPods but with “hey Siri“ functionality and a H1 chip instead of a W1) with regular charging case - AirPods 2 with a wireless charging case - AirPods Pro (only come in a wireless charging case)
